entries.femaleVariant: [en_us]Hey! Where are you going? Get back here!
[en_us]It's here. Come with me.
[en_us]An abandoned construction site?
[en_us]Goddamn city... Gave it all, then took it all right back...
[en_us]Apparently, they lured her here. She didn't realize her life was in danger until was too late.
[en_us]As good a place as any other. More importantly, away from others.
[en_us]Where we headed?
[en_us]Do it.
[en_us]To the place they ended her life.
[en_us]I want to see what she saw before I die.
[en_us]Goodbye, Ken. You deserve this.
[en_us]Goodbye, Ken.
[en_us]Want to leave me no way out, is that it?
[en_us]You sure?
[en_us]Poetic.
[en_us]Not exactly, it's just... it's how it ought to be.
[en_us]At least she wasn't scared.
[en_us]Yes. You're right...
[en_us]Ken, listen... My company spat me out too. Was handed a dirty job by a higher-up. Thought it was game over for me.
[en_us]You deserve this.
[en_us]Sure about this?
[en_us]I know.
[en_us]Just do it.
[en_us]Goodbye, Ken.
[en_us]But I got help. He showed me it's possible to find meaning another way. Then I lost him too, just like you lost Enid.
[en_us]There's the problem. I don't want it.
[en_us]Fuck you! You hear me?!
[en_us]I...I can do this... Just once...
[en_us]But look at me! I got my life back! Stupid as it might sound, all you gotta do is want it back.
[en_us]We had a deal, you hear me!? You gave your word!
[en_us]And the platypuses?
[en_us]W-what...? What platypuses?
[en_us]The ones your daughter wanted to give life to. Her unfulfilled dream.
[en_us]Why mention that? Do you want to see me drown in my grief even more?
[en_us]Enid would consider you a coward.
[en_us]You can fulfill her dream.
[en_us]You're a coward, the pathetic way you just roll over.
[en_us]If you die, the last memory of her dies with you, d'you understand? Like she never existed. You want that?
[en_us]I lost everything. Where would even begin to get the resources for...for a biotech breakthrough?
[en_us]It's true. Do you want my apology for being weak? Well, it's my right.
[en_us]Do you think Enid would want this? That because--
[en_us]Enid doesn't want anything! She can't because of me! You get that yet?! Just let me die!
[en_us]What about the platypuses?
[en_us]And if that person doesn't have the strength to live in a world without you?
わからない
[en_us]It's not about the platypuses.
[en_us]No clue – think of something. Make an effort. You're a hundred times smarter than me.
[en_us]Maybe the platypuses are stupid idea – I dunno, you're the scientist. That's not what this is about.
[en_us]I do know one thing. Life's a fucking roller coaster. I'm 24 and I... well, I could die really damn soon.
[en_us]W-what? What're you talking about?
[en_us]And y'know what? I don't want the world to forget about me. That's why I crawled out from the bottom through all the shit. Understand?
[en_us]If there's anyone anywhere who cares about me, they better buckle their ass in and spend whatever time they can with me.
[en_us]Then, when I'm dead, stand over my grave and rock their grandkids' minds with stories about how V lived for somethin'!
[en_us]Then they better find it. For my sake.
[en_us]Good luck, Ken.
